targets.rawSql:
select
totalpositivecases
from pcm_dpc_italy

select
currentpositivecases
from pcm_dpc_italy

select
deaths
from pcm_dpc_italy

select
deaths * 100.0 / totalPositiveCases
from pcm_dpc_italy
where ts = $last_ts

select
recovered
from pcm_dpc_italy

select
1586004872 as time,
regionname,
totalpositivecases
from pcm_dpc_regions
where ts = $last_ts
order by totalpositivecases desc

select
1586004872 as time,
regionname,
deaths
from pcm_dpc_regions
where ts = $last_ts
order by totalpositivecases desc

select
1586004872 as time,
regionname,
recovered
from pcm_dpc_regions
where ts = $last_ts
order by recovered desc

select
testsperformed
from pcm_dpc_italy

select
totalPositiveCases * 100.0 / testsperformed
from pcm_dpc_italy
where ts = $last_ts

select
regionName as Region,
currentPositiveCases as "Current positives cases",
totalPositiveCases as "Total positive cases",
testsPerformed as "Tests performed",
deaths as "Deaths",
recovered as "Recovered",
homeConfinement as "Home confinement",
totalHospitalised as  "Total Hospitalises",
hospitalisedWithSymptoms as "Hospitalised with symptoms",
intensiveCare as "Intensive Care"
from pcm_dpc_regions
where ts = 1587427200000
order by regionname desc

select
  ts as time,
  ${metric:csv} as "Daily data"
from pcm_dpc_italy
where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
order by ts

with T1 as (
	select
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts ASC) RowNumber,
		cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as Date,
		sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv}
	from pcm_dpc_italy 
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 5 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)
select
	date as time,
	IIF(RowNumber > 4, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 5"
from T2
order by date

with T1 as (
	select
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts ASC) RowNumber,
		cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as Date,
		sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv}
	from pcm_dpc_italy 
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 30 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)
select
	date as time,
	IIF(RowNumber > 4, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 30"
from T2
order by date

select
totalpositivecases
from pcm_dpc_regions
where regionname = '$region'

select
currentpositivecases
from pcm_dpc_regions
where regionname = '$region'

select
deaths
from pcm_dpc_regions
where regionname = '$region'

select
deaths * 100.0 / totalPositiveCases
from pcm_dpc_regions
where ts = $last_ts
and regionname = '$region'

select
recovered
from pcm_dpc_regions
where regionname = '$region'

select
testsperformed
from pcm_dpc_regions
where regionname = '$region'

select
totalPositiveCases * 100.0 / testsperformed
from pcm_dpc_regions
where ts = $last_ts
and regionname = '$region'

select
  ts as time,
  ${metric:csv} as "Daily data"
from pcm_dpc_regions
where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
and regionname='$region'

	from pcm_dpc_regions
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	and regionname='$region'
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 30 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)
select
	date as time,
	IIF(RowNumber > 4, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 30"
from T2
order by date

select
  ts as time,
  ${metric:csv} as "Daily data"
from pcm_dpc_regions
where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
and regionname='$region'
order by ts

with T1 as (
	select
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts ASC) RowNumber,
		cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as Date,
		sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv}
	from pcm_dpc_regions
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	and regionname='$region'
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 5 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)

	IIF(RowNumber > 4, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 5"
from T2
order by date

list.definition: SELECT top 1 convert(varchar(10),cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date)) from covid_data.dbo.pcm_dpc_italy order by ts desc
list.name: last_date
list.query: SELECT top 1 convert(varchar(10),cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date)) from covid_data.dbo.pcm_dpc_italy order by ts desc

list.definition:
SELECT readableName __text, columnName __value 
FROM (VALUES
	('totalPositiveCases','Total Positive Cases'),
	('newPositiveCases','New Positive Cases'),
	('currentPositiveCases', 'Current Positive Cases'),
	('newCurrentPositiveCases','New Current Positive Cases'),
	('deaths','Deaths'),
	('recovered', 'Recovered'),
	('homeConfinement','Home Confinement'),
	('totalHospitalised','Total Hospitalised'),
	('hospitalisedWithSymptoms','Hospitalised With Symptoms'),
	('intensiveCare','Intensive Care'),
	('testsPerformed','Tests Performed')
	) t1 (columnName,readableName)
list.label: Metric
list.name: metric
list.query:
SELECT readableName __text, columnName __value 
FROM (VALUES
	('totalPositiveCases','Total Positive Cases'),
	('newPositiveCases','New Positive Cases'),
	('currentPositiveCases', 'Current Positive Cases'),
	('newCurrentPositiveCases','New Current Positive Cases'),
	('deaths','Deaths'),
	('recovered', 'Recovered'),
	('homeConfinement','Home Confinement'),
	('totalHospitalised','Total Hospitalised'),
	('hospitalisedWithSymptoms','Hospitalised With Symptoms'),
	('intensiveCare','Intensive Care'),
	('testsPerformed','Tests Performed')
	) t1 (columnName,readableName)

list.definition: SELECT regionName FROM pcm_dpc_regions ORDER BY regionName
list.label: Region
list.name: region
list.query: SELECT regionName FROM pcm_dpc_regions ORDER BY regionName
